pageProps.articleContent:
In this part, We'll continue with main section and then we'll create footer.

Github Repo: Chakra-airbnb Demo: Chakra-airbnb

Info section

<Heading
        as="h3"
        fontSize="1.5rem"
        fontWeight="bold"
        textAlign="left"
        mb={{ base: "4", lg: "2" }}
        pb={4}
        borderBottom="1px solid"
        borderColor="gray.300"
      >
        Traveling with AirBnb
      </Heading>
      <Flex
        as="section"
        alignItems="start"
        justify="between"
        flexDirection={{ base: "column", lg: "row" }}
        my={{ base: "1.5rem", lg: "2.5rem" }}
        borderBottom="1px solid"
        borderColor="gray.300"
        pb={8}
      >
        <Box
          w={{ base: "100%", lg: 1 / 3 }}
          px={{ lg: "0.5rem" }}
          mb={{ base: "6", lg: "0" }}
        >
          <svg
            style={{ width: "2rem", height: "2rem" }}
            viewBox="0 0 24 24"
            fill="#60B6B5"
            fill-opacity="0"
            stroke="#60B6B5"
            stroke-width="1"
            focusable="false"
            aria-hidden="true"
            role="presentation"
            strokeLinecap="round"
            strokeLinejoin="round"
          >
            <path
              d="m17.5 2.9c-2.1 0-4.1 1.3-5.4 2.8-1.6-1.6-3.8-3.2-6.2-2.7-1.5.2-2.9 1.2-3.6 2.6-2.3 4.1 1 8.3 3.9 11.1 1.4 1.3 2.8 2.5 4.3 3.6.4.3 1.1.9 1.6.9s1.2-.6 1.6-.9c3.2-2.3 6.6-5.1 8.2-8.8 1.5-3.4 0-8.6-4.4-8.6"
              stroke-linejoin="round"
            ></path>
          </svg>
          <Text textAlign="left" fontWeight="700" mt={3} mb={1}>
            24/7 customer support
          </Text>
          <Text
            color="gray.700"
            fontSize="0.875rem"
            fontWeight="300"
            textAlign="left"
            mt={3}
            mb={1}
          >
            Day or night, we’re here for you. Talk to our support team from
            anywhere in the world, any hour of day.
          </Text>
        </Box>
        <Box
          w={{ base: "100%", lg: 1 / 3 }}
          px={{ lg: "0.5rem" }}
          mb={{ base: "6", lg: "0" }}
        >
          <svg
            style={{ width: "2rem", height: "2rem" }}
            viewBox="0 0 24 24"
            role="presentation"
            aria-hidden="true"
            focusable="false"
            fill="#60B6B5"
          >
            <path
              d="m23.57 11.4-1.75-1.76-3.85-3.87-1.78-1.79-2.7-2.71-.82-.83-.22-.23-.06-.06c-.22-.22-.53-.22-.73-.02l-1.75 1.76-3.85 3.87-3.85 3.87-1.75 1.76a1.49 1.49 0 0 0 -.44 1.05v.01c0 .38.15.77.44 1.06l.55.55a1.49 1.49 0 0 0 2.01.08v8.4c0 .81.68 1.45 1.5 1.45h15c .82 0 1.5-.65 1.5-1.45v-8.4c.59.49 1.45.47 2.01-.08l.55-.55c.29-.29.44-.68.44-1.06v-.01c0-.38-.14-.77-.44-1.06zm-3.57 11.16c0 .24-.22.45-.5.45h-15c-.28 0-.5-.21-.5-.45v-9.36l8-7.99 8 7.99zm2.85-9.74-.55.55c-.2.2-.52.2-.71.01l-9.24-9.22a.5.5 0 0 0 -.71 0l-9.24 9.22a.5.5 0 0 1 -.71-.01l-.55-.55a.5.5 0 0 1 -.01-.71l1.75-1.76 3.85-3.87 3.85-3.87 1.4-1.4.77.77 2.7 2.71 1.78 1.79 3.85 3.87 1.75 1.76a.51.51 0 0 1 -.01.71z"
              fillRule="evenodd"
            ></path>
          </svg>
          <Text textAlign="left" fontWeight="700" mt={3} mb={1}>
            Global hospitality standards
          </Text>
          <Text
            color="gray.700"
            fontSize="0.875rem"
            fontWeight="300"
            textAlign="left"
            mt={3}
            mb={1}
          >
            Guests review their hosts after each stay. All hosts must maintain a
            minimum rating and our hospitality standards to be on Airbnb.
          </Text>
        </Box>
        <Box
          w={{ base: "100%", lg: 1 / 3 }}
          px={{ lg: "0.5rem" }}
          mb={{ base: "6", lg: "0" }}
        >
          <svg
            style={{ width: "2rem", height: "2rem" }}
            viewBox="0 0 24 24"
            role="presentation"
            aria-hidden="true"
            focusable="false"
            fill="#60B6B5"
          >
            <path
              d="m15.37 13.54-.01.01a.53.53 0 0 0 .01-.01m-.37 9.46h-11.5c-.28 0-.9-.22-1.38-.58-.71-.52-1.12-1.31-1.12-2.42 0-.04 0-.07.01-.11.09-1.1 1.59-2.44 4.02-3.79a33.14 33.14 0 0 1 2.9-1.42 35.57 35.57 0 0 1 1.31-.54c.63-.26.71-.95.18-1.35a4.55 4.55 0 0 1 -.38-.31 7.1 7.1 0 0 1 -.84-.9c-.73-.92-1.17-1.96-1.2-3.09v-2.99c.07-2.36 2.38-4.5 5.04-4.5 2.67 0 4.96 2.14 4.96 4.5v3c0 1.13-.43 2.17-1.15 3.11a7.35 7.35 0 0 1 -1.09 1.13l-.08.07c-.02.02-.02.02-.05.05s-.03.03-.09.14c-.05.47-.05.47.46.7a.49.49 0 0 0 .36-.15l.06-.05a8.32 8.32 0 0 0 1.23-1.28c.84-1.1 1.35-2.35 1.35-3.72v-3c0-2.92-2.75-5.5-5.96-5.5-3.2 0-5.96 2.56-6.04 5.49v3.01c.03 1.38.56 2.62 1.42 3.71.31.39.63.73.96 1.03.06.05.1.08.15.12a34.28 34.28 0 0 0 -3.98 1.87c-2.73 1.51-4.41 3.02-4.54 4.58a2.41 2.41 0 0 0 -.01.19c0 2.55 1.91 3.99 3.5 4h11.5a.5.5 0 1 0 0-1m7.67-4.22c-.36.74-.97 1.55-1.78 2.38a20.33 20.33 0 0 1 -1.89 1.71 19.94 19.94 0 0 1 -1.89-1.71c-.81-.83-1.42-1.64-1.78-2.38-.22-.45-.33-.86-.33-1.23 0-.99.61-1.56 1.43-1.56.7 0 1.55.53 2.18 1.31a.5.5 0 0 0 .78 0c .63-.78 1.48-1.31 2.18-1.31.82 0 1.43.57 1.43 1.56 0 .36-.11.77-.33 1.23m-1.1-3.78c-.89 0-1.82.5-2.57 1.25-.75-.76-1.68-1.25-2.57-1.25-1.36 0-2.43 1.01-2.43 2.56 0 .53.15 1.08.43 1.66.41.85 1.09 1.74 1.96 2.64a21.09 21.09 0 0 0 2.31 2.05.5.5 0 0 0 .6 0 20.91 20.91 0 0 0 2.31-2.05c.87-.9 1.55-1.79 1.96-2.64.28-.58.43-1.13.43-1.66 0-1.55-1.07-2.56-2.43-2.56"
              fillRule="evenodd"
            ></path>
          </svg>
          <Text textAlign="left" fontWeight="700" mt={3} mb={1}>
            5-star hosts
          </Text>
          <Text
            color="gray.700"
            fontSize="0.875rem"
            fontWeight="300"
            textAlign="left"
            mt={3}
            mb={1}
          >
            From fresh-pressed sheets to tips on where to get the best brunch,
            our hosts are full of local hospitality.
          </Text>
        </Box>
      </Flex>

Places cards

<Heading
        as="h3"
        fontSize="1.5rem"
        fontWeight="bold"
        textAlign="left"
        mb={{ base: "4", lg: "2" }}
      >
        Just booked in the United States
      </Heading>

      <Flex
        as="section"
        alignItems="start"
        justify="between"
        flexWrap="wrap"
        my={{ base: "1.5rem", lg: "2rem" }}
      >
        <Link
          href="#"
          w={{ base: "100%", md: "50%", lg: 1 / 4 }}
          px={{ md: "0.25rem", lg: "0.25rem" }}
          mb={{ base: "1.5rem", lg: "0" }}
          textAlign="left"
          _hover={{ textDecoration: "none" }}
        >
          <Image src="/images/just-booked-1.jpg" objectFit="cover" w="100%" />
          <Text
            color="gray.600"
            fontSize="0.75rem"
            fontWeight="700"
            textTransform="uppercase"
            pt="0.5rem"
          >
            Entire House <span aria-hidden="true">•</span> Joshua Tree
          </Text>
          <Heading
            as="h4"
            my="0.25rem"
            fontSize="1.125rem"
            fontWeight="500"
            lineHeight="1.375"
          >
            The Joshua Tree House
          </Heading>
          <Text color="gray.600" fontSize="0.875rem" mb="0.25rem">
            $285/night
          </Text>
          <Flex alignItems="center">
            <Star />
            <Star />
            <Star />
            <Star />
            <Text color="gray.600" fontSize="0.75rem">
              467 <span aria-hidden>•</span> Superhost
            </Text>
          </Flex>
        </Link>
      </Flex>

Footer section

footer code

blogDetails.body_markdown: > In this part, We'll continue with main section and then we'll create footer. **Github Repo:** [Chakra-airbnb](https://github.com/MA-Ahmad/chakra-airbnb) **Demo:** [Chakra-airbnb](https://chakra-airbnb.vercel.app) ### Info section ![info](https://dev-to-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/uploads/articles/4dukpyivutg0saijnp5v.png) ```javascript Traveling with AirBnb 24/7 customer support Day or night, we’re here for you. Talk to our support team from anywhere in the world, any hour of day. Global hospitality standards Guests review their hosts after each stay. All hosts must maintain a minimum rating and our hospitality standards to be on Airbnb. 5-star hosts From fresh-pressed sheets to tips on where to get the best brunch, our hosts are full of local hospitality. ``` ### Places cards ![cards](https://dev-to-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/uploads/articles/91odymm7ac1mh51p8exj.png) ```javascript Just booked in the United States Entire House • Joshua Tree The Joshua Tree House $285/night 467 • Superhost ``` ### Footer section ![footer](https://dev-to-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/uploads/articles/ot2eo7f3y08tafdp5zc9.png) [footer code](https://github.com/MA-Ahmad/chakra-airbnb/blob/main/components/layout/footer.tsx)
